name: Fidget Spinner - Fun Spinner Action
description:
Fidget spinners come to your phone and to your pocket!

From now on, you can collect tons of unique spinners in this game, packed with fun spinning action. It's a realistic simulator that replicates the actual live feeling. Very easy to learn, but it takes skill to level up and unlock every available spinner. After unlocking, you can switch between them and choose the shape and color that you like best. And on top of that, you will always want to beat the high score and constantly upgrade!

- Tons of different fidget spinners
- Fun spinning simulation
- Beat the highscore and upgrade

So, go on and do some fun fidget spinning!
